title: Danish road signs ID
content:
Hi Guys,

Which Typeface is this:  
 [http://klaus-johansen.dk/pix/14skilt1-640.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144315/http:/klaus-johansen.dk/pix/14skilt1-640.jpg "http://klaus-johansen.dk/pix/14skilt1-640.jpg")

itâ€™s on every single Danish road sign.

Cheers
author: Lasse Kristensen

comments.content:
Looks like Transport. Can be download for free from [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144315/http:/www.cbrd.co.uk/media/fonts/).  
Only the numbers are different, but those are similar to Interstate.

Kind regards,  
Martijn van Berkel
It seems like that is the one, thank you!
A professional version of Transport with an extended character set is published by [URW](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144315/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/families/transport/).

[The SAA series](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144315/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/families/saa_series/?&sample_text=0123456789) also has similar numerals. Here are more [fonts derived from road sign lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144315/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/road_sign_lettering/).
